VPAT Certification

Our Accessibiltiy Experts understand Section 508 & WCAG requirments and will work with you to make your website comliant. Once you meet the requirments we will issue you our VPAT Certification.

Wait we don't stop there. We offer Accessibiltiy Monitoring so that you can continue to updat your site worry free and we will send you monthly Compliance Reports so you can keep your Certification current.
